name: Arjun Shakthi
summary_positioning: Full-Stack Engineer with strong frontend architecture skills and backend microservices experience in startup environments. End-to-end feature owner with cross-team collaboration across product and design. Experienced in building user-facing platforms serving 800K+ registered users.

bullets.base_content: Designed and implemented a modular React component architecture with a shared design system, reducing UI development time for new features by 40%.
Architected frontend state management layer using Redux Toolkit, establishing data-fetching patterns and caching strategies that standardized API consumption across the application.
Implemented code-splitting and lazy-loading strategies across the React SPA, reducing initial bundle size by 35% and improving first contentful paint metrics.
Defined service boundaries and designed REST API contracts for 4 backend microservices in a 3-5 engineer startup team, establishing the foundational backend architecture.
Designed PostgreSQL database schemas handling 80K+ records across users, jobs, and preferences, with indexed query patterns supporting sub-second response times.
Implemented secure authentication flows using JWT-based token management with refresh token rotation and role-based access control for the platform.
Defined and implemented the async communication strategy using Apache Kafka for event-driven processing between microservices, decoupling recommendation and notification pipelines.
Configured Kafka consumer groups with dead-letter queue handling, ensuring reliable message processing across the recommendation and user-activity tracking services.
Built and maintained a user-facing platform serving 800K+ registered users and approximately 1K monthly active users, handling job matching and recommendation workflows.
Redesigned the job recommendation algorithm, reducing recommendation latency from 15 seconds to 5-7 seconds through query optimization and caching layer introduction.
Performed database query profiling and optimization on PostgreSQL, identifying and resolving N+1 query patterns and adding composite indexes for frequently accessed endpoints.

Collaborated closely with product and design teams to translate product requirements into technical specifications, participating in sprint planning and effort estimation for 1-3 month feature cycles.
Conducted internal knowledge-sharing sessions on frontend architecture patterns and Kafka integration strategies, improving team onboarding efficiency.
Owned features end-to-end from technical design through deployment, handling frontend UI, backend API, database schema changes, and production rollout within 1-3 month delivery cycles.
Served as regular PR reviewer for the engineering team, enforcing code quality standards and architectural consistency across frontend and backend codebases.
Led large module refactors within a 50K-150K LOC codebase, decomposing monolithic React components into testable, reusable units and migrating legacy API patterns to standardized service layers.
Configured CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated build, lint, and deployment workflows, reducing manual deployment steps and improving release confidence.
Implemented input validation and sanitization layers across API endpoints to prevent XSS and injection vulnerabilities, following OWASP guidelines for secure web application development.
Actively handled production bug triage and resolution, implementing structured logging and error tracking to reduce mean time to detection for critical user-facing issues.

projects.name: Job Recommendation Platform
projects.description: Full-stack job matching platform with personalized recommendations
highlights: Built recommendation engine serving 800K+ registered users
Designed microservices architecture with event-driven async processing
